sentences.en: A much greater structural risk occurs in temperate and tropical areas.
sentences.cn: 在温带和热带地区会出现更大的结构风险.

sentences.en: Storms have caused structural damage to hundreds of homes.
sentences.cn: 几场暴风雨毁了成百上千所住宅，连结构都破坏了。

sentences.en: structural changes in the computer industry
sentences.cn: 电脑行业的结构性改变

sentences.en: Structural theories focus on the composition of the economy.
sentences.cn: 结构主义理论的重点,放在经济构成上.

sentences.en: The basic structural unit of yarn is the fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维是纱的基本结构单元.

sentences.en: The earthquake caused minor structural damage.
sentences.cn: 这次地震造成了轻微的结构破坏。

sentences.en: The entire gastrointestinal canal presents certain common structural characteristics.
sentences.cn: 整个胃肠道具有某些共同的结构特点.

sentences.en: The intention was to distract egg - laying females from furniture or structural wood.
sentences.cn: 其目的是把产卵的雌虫从家具或建筑木材中分离出来.

sentences.en: The majority of synthetic copolymers contain only two types of structural unit.
sentences.cn: 大多数的合成共聚物只有两种形式的结构单元.

sentences.en: The nephron is the structural and functional unit of the kidney.
sentences.cn: 肾单位是肾脏的结构和功能单位.

sentences.en: The North American continent is made up of three great structural entities.
sentences.cn: 北美大陆是由三个构造单元组成的.

sentences.en: The origins of structural theories are eclectic at best.
sentences.cn: 结构主义理论的起源充其量也不过是折衷主义.

sentences.en: The structural plan of the egg is more or less similar.
sentences.cn: 卵的结构图案多少是类似的.

sentences.en: These structural changes agree well with the best theoretical predictions.
sentences.cn: 这些结构上的变化同最成功的理论预言很好地相吻合.

sentences.en: This gives us the structural formula of the molecule.
sentences.cn: 这种方式给出了分子的结构式.

sentences.en: Trimeris'compound , called T - 20 , blocks the final structural contortions from taking place.
sentences.cn: T -20是特里米瑞斯公司生产的化合物.它能阻止分子最终结构折叠的发生.

sentences.en: We had taken great pains to check the structural soundness of the coachwork.
sentences.cn: 我们下了很大的工夫检查汽车车身的结构是否安全。

words.tran_cn: 组织；构成（structure的过去分词）；建造

phrases.tran_cn: 结构调整，薪级结构调整
结构变化；结构改变，构造转换
结构工程；（桥梁等的）结构工程学；建筑工程
结构模型；几何相似模型
结构钢；钢架；结构用钢材
结构系统；构造/结构体系

trans.tran_cn: 结构（上）的，构架（上）的，建筑的，构造上的，组织上的
trans.tran_en: connected with the structure of something
